title: What are your favorite lyrics from Billie Eilish songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh! Some of my Favorite Lyrics are: "I do what I want when I'm wanting to" - bad guy "I'm that bad type, make-your-mama-sad type, make-your-girlfriend-mad type, might-seduce-your-dad type" - bad guy "I'm the bad guy, duh" - bad guy "I'm only good at being bad" - bad guy "I don't see what she sees but maybe it's 'cause I'm wearing your cologne" - bad guy "I don't need a xanny to feel better" - xanny "You should see me in a crown" - you should see me in a crown "Watch me make 'em bow, one by one by one" - you should see me in a crown "And once the water starts to rise and heaven's out of sight, she'll want the Devil on her team" - all good girls go to hell "Don't say, I'm not your type" - wish you were gay "Wait a minute, let me finish" - 8 "And it burns like a gin and I like it, put your lips on my skin and you might ignite it" - my strange addiction "But we knew right from the start that you'd fall apart 'Cause I'm too expensive" - bury a friend "Too intoxicated to be scared" - xanny "Please don't try to kiss me on the sidewalk" - xanny "Standing there, killing time, can't commit to anything but a crime" - all good girls go to hell "All the good girls go to hell, 'cause even God herself has enemies" - all good girls go to hell "Don't ask questions, you don't wanna know" - my strange addiction "Today, I'm thinkin' about the things that are deadly" - bury a friend "What do you want from me? Why don't you run from me? What are you wondering? What do you know?" - bury a friend "When we all fall asleep, where do we go?" - bury a friend "For the debt I owe, gotta sell my soul" - bury a friend "The world's a little blurry or maybe it's my eyes" - ilomilo "The friends I've had to bury, they keep me up at night" - ilomilo "Never been the type to let someone see right through" - i love you "Maybe we should just try to tell ourselves a good lie" - i love you "Make the same mistakes, blame circumstance" - xanny "Bite my tongue bide my time" - you should see me in a crown "Your silence is my favourite sound" - you should see me in a crown "Baby, I don't feel so good, six words you never understood" - wish you were gay "I'll never let you go, five words you'll never say" - wish you were gay "I laugh along like nothing's wrong" - wish you were gay "I know you don't care, but can you listen?" - 8 "Hurts, but I know how to hide it, kinda like it" - my strange addiction "It's probably somethin' that shouldn't be said out loud, honestly, I thought that I would be dead by now" - bury a friend "Told you not to worry but maybe that's a lie" - ilomilo "Wanna be lonely so show me the way home I can't lose another life" - ilomilo "If you need me, wanna see me better hurry 'cause I'm leavin' soon" - listen before i go "Taste me, the salty tears on my cheek, that's what a year-long headache does to you" - listen before i go "I'm not okay, I feel so scattered, don't say I'm all that matters" - listen before i go "Bruises on both my knees for you" - bad guy "I like it when you take control, even if you know that you don't own me" - bad guy "Fell for these ocean eyes" - you should see me in a crown "I'm so selfish but you make me feel helpless" - wish you were gay "Don't you know I'm no good for you?" - when the party's over "I'll only hurt you if you let me" - when the party's over "I'm the powder, you're the fuse just add some friction" - my strange addiction "You are my strange addiction" - my strange addiction "Be my reliever 'cause I don't self medicate" - my strange addiction "The way I'm drinkin' you down like I wanna drown, like I wanna end me" - bury a friend "Remember not to get too close to stars, they're never gonna give you love like ours" - ilomilo "Tell me love is endless, don't be so pretentious" - listen before i go "The smile that you gave me Even when you felt like dyin'" - i love you "We fall apart as it gets dark, I'm in your arms in Central Park" - i love you "I can't afford to love someone who isn't dying by mistake" - xanny "Look at you needing me, you know I'm not your friend without some greenery" - all good girls to hell "I just wanna make you feel okay but all you do is look the other way" - wish you were gay "I can't tell you how much I wish I didn't wanna stay" - wish you were gay "Is there a reason we're not through? Is there a twelve step just for you?" - wish you were gay "Once we've both said our goodbyes, let's just let it go, let me let you go" - when the party's over "Wore my heart out on a chain around my neck but now it's missin'" - 8 "I never really know how to please you you're lookin' at me like I'm see-through" - 8 "'Cause who am I to be in love when your love never is for me" - 8 "What had you expected? Me to make you my art and make you a star?" - bury a friend "Said I couldn't love someone 'cause I might break" - ilomilo "I just wanted to protect you but now I'll never get to" - ilomilo "You didn't mean to say I love you. I love you and I don't want to" - i love you

I love all of her lyrics. I know this sounds a bit cringe and stuff but she music helped me a lot in 2019. I’m not a fan of her newer releases but I still listen to her albums when I’m doing homework or feeling sad. We all get a bit depressed when something bad happens to us. Something happened in October which really made me upset and I was crying the whole night. Music helps me calm down so I went on Spotify and played my playlist. “Wish you were gay” came up and I was reading the little thing at the bottom from Genius. Spotify will add these things called “Behind the lyrics” if Genius interviews the artist and it’ll be like some facts about the song or the meaning of it.    It said that Billie wrote this song because she liked someone and they didn’t like her back, and she was so sad about, she just wanted him to say “I’m gay, that’s why I don’t like you.” This really stood out to me. To spare my prideTo give your lack of interest an explanationDon't say I'm not your typeJust say that I'm not your preferred sexual orientation This was exactly what I was feeling at the moment. My childhood friend who I liked a lot told me that he didn’t like me at all and that I was “unattractive” and “ugly and annoying” It hurt. A lot. Her music helped me calm down and it was relatable. So, those are my favorite lyrics from her songs. I really recommend you go look at this song
